Package org.hl7.util

Interface Summary
ForwardReferenceTool.Reference<V> A forward reference object that can be returned from the map in the disguise of an actual object that should be on the map.
ForwardReferenceTool.Replacer<V> An object that knows how to replace forward references with proper objects once the references are resolved.
ForwardReferenceTool.ReplacerFactory<V> A factory to create a replacer only if needed.
SelectionIterator.Criterion<S> An interface to a selection criterion that can be tested against an object of type T.
SelectionIterator.Transformer<S,T> An interface to transform the input object to an output object.
 

Class Summary
Base64 Encode arbitrary binary into printable ASCII using BASE64 encoding.
ClassMethodTool A tool to find a method or constructor on an object that matches a signature.
DatatypeAnalyzer Provides static methods to analyze a data value to understand what it is in terms of the HL7 data type specification.
FactoryFinder  
ForwardReferenceTool<V> This class deals with forward references that can happen in any symbol-table driven structure.
NullIterator<T> A helper implementation of an empty iterator; can be used with any component type.
RimUtil  
SelectionIterator<S,T> A tool to filter elements from a collection (via the collection's iterator).
StringUtils A utility class that contains common functions dealing with strings.
 

Exception Summary
DatatypeAnalyzer.AnalysisException An exception that we throw.
FactoryException An exception thrown by RimFactory.getInstance() or DatatypeHandlerFactory.getInstance() or else if findinging a factory instance fails.
ForwardReferenceTool.DuplicateKeyException  
ForwardReferenceTool.UnresolvedReferenceException
